name: Raymond SMOLSKY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Raymond SMOLSKY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
889 A.2d 500
Raymond SMOLSKY, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2005.
